verbs.description: [ARG1: ' Modern Family ' co - creator Steve Levitan] [V: is] [ARG2: the latest Hollywood content creator to speak out against parent company Fox for continuing to give Fox News a platform amid coverage of the Trump administration 's immigration policy debate] .
